changelog.md.S'il n'y a pas d'information sur la mise: If there is no information on the update, it means that it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Mise à jour des appels pour être compati: Updated calls to be compatible with the V5 Enedis Data-Connect API
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option pour désactiver les d: Added option to disable hourly data
changelog.md.Suppression des dépendances déjà nécessa: Removed dependencies already needed for core
changelog.md.Les paramètres de couleur du template de: The widget template color settings are now in the equipment configuration, Display tab, Widget section
changelog.md.Mise à jour de la liste des commandes po: Updated command list for Jeedom v4.3
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug d'affichage des donn: Fixed a production data display bug in case of multiple widgets on the page
changelog.md.Optimisation des appels aux serveurs Ene: Optimization of calls to Enedis servers
changelog.md.Suppression de la commande \"Production: Removal of the "Maximum Power Production" command
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la collecte des: Fixed a bug on data collection on January 1st
changelog.md.vert = OK, rouge = KO, orange = certaine: green = OK, red = KO, orange = some data KO
changelog.md.Ajout d'un voyant sur le widget pour sav: Addition of an indicator on the widget to know if the data is up to date
changelog.md.Correction pour éviter que l'auto-progra: Correction to prevent auto-programming from being stopped in rare cases
changelog.md.Possibilité d'intégrer des historiques à: Possibility of integrating histories on demand
changelog.md.Réorganisation des paramètres de configu: Reorganization of configuration settings, files and documentation
changelog.md.Ajout de la gestion des dépendances afin: Added dependency management to confirm the presence of `php-mbstring` absent on some installations
changelog.md.Nouvelle icône du plugin plus en accord: New plugin icon more in line with Enedis prerogatives
changelog.md.Réécriture complète du plugin qui utilis: Complete rewrite of the plugin which now uses the Enedis Data-Connect API
changelog.md.Possibilité de récupérer la consommation: Possibility of recovering consumption, production or both measurements at the same time
changelog.md.Génération automatique des historiques s: Automatic generation of histories for the last 3 years when creating orders
changelog.md.Réécriture des templates de widgets dash: Rewriting of dashboard & mobile widget templates
changelog.md.Ajout de la possibilité de choisir la co: Added the possibility to choose the background color of the widget template
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug d'affichage en vue m: Fixed a display bug in mobile view without the widget template
changelog.md.Ajout du template pour version dashboard: Addition of the template for dashboard version
changelog.md.Ajout du template pour version mobile: Addition of the template for mobile version
changelog.md.Optimisation du nombre d'appels aux serv: Optimization of the number of calls to Enedis servers
changelog.md.Récupération des informations à une minu: Retrieval of information at a random minute so as not to overload the Enedis servers
changelog.md.Mise à disposition du plugin en version: Provision of the plugin in beta version

index.md.Plugin permettant la récupération des do: Plugin allowing the recovery of electricity consumption data from smart meters
index.md.Le plugin a été totalement réécrit en fé: The plugin was completely rewritten in February 2021 to use
index.md.Si vous utilisiez le plugin auparavant,: If you used the plugin before, we invite you to create a new equipment or to delete all the controls of a previous equipment
index.md.Il est possible d'accéder aux données de: It is possible to access data from
index.md.ou aux 2 types de mesure directement dan: or to the 2 types of measurement directly in a device
index.md.5 données sont remontées pour chaque typ: 5 data are reported for each type of measurement
index.md.Les données n'étant pas mises à disposit: As the data is not made available in real time, the plugin retrieves the electricity consumption data from the day before each day
index.md.Tant que le plugin n'a pas récupéré l'in: As long as the plugin has not retrieved all the data from the previous day, it continues to query the Enedis servers every 30 minutes, otherwise the calls are suspended until the next day
index.md.Comme tout plugin Jeedom, le plugin: Like any Jeedom plugin, the plugin
index.md.j'accède à mon espace client Enedis: I access my Enedis customer area
index.md.Si ce n'est pas déjà fait, commencez par: If you haven't already done so, start by authorizing the sharing of Enedis data with Jeedom by clicking on the button
index.md.vos identifiants au market Jeedom: your login details for the Jeedom market
index.md.Vous êtes alors redirigé vers cette page: You are then redirected to this page on which you must inform
index.md.Redirection vers la page de consentement: Redirection to the Enedis consent page on which it is necessary
index.md.Une fois le partage des données validé,: Once the data sharing is validated, this page is displayed
index.md.Si vous ne parvenez pas à accéder à l'un: If you are unable to access any of these pages, disable the browser ad blocker
index.md.permet d'ajouter un nouveau compteur\/PD: allows you to add a new meter / PDL
index.md.le numéro d'identification du Point de L: the identification number of the Delivery Point
index.md.Une fois le partage des données autorisé: Once data sharing has been authorized from the plugin configuration page, all you have to do is enter
index.md.Lors de la 1ère sauvegarde d'un équipeme: During the 1st backup of an active and configured device, the plugin will automatically create the necessary commands and integrate the histories available on the Enedis site since January 1st of the current year
index.md.Ce processus est susceptible de durer pl: This process is likely to take several minutes, you can follow the progress from the menu
index.md.Les données de consommation horaire sont: Hourly consumption data is retrieved over the last 7 days at most
index.md.sur votre compte Enedis, il faudra coche: on your Enedis account, you must tick the box
index.md.pour que les commandes correspondantes n: so that the corresponding orders are not created
index.md.Il est possible d'intégrer des historiqu: It is possible to integrate histories on demand, up to 3 years back, directly from the Enedis site
index.md.Pour se faire, il suffit de cliquer sur: To do so, just click on the blue button
index.md.d'un équipement, dans la colonne: of an item of equipment, in the column
index.md.Choisissez ensuite la date de début puis: Then choose the start date and click on
index.md.Les données jour, mois, année et puissan: The day, month, year and maximum power data will be integrated from the date chosen until January 1 of the current year
index.md.Les données horaires, quand à elles, ser: The hourly data, when they are, will be integrated up to 7 days after the chosen date
index.md.Ces contraintes de temps sont fixées par: These time constraints are set by Enedis
index.md.Le template de widget sera affiché aussi: The widget template will be displayed on both desktop and mobile versions
index.md.vert = toutes les données sont à jour, o: green = all data is up to date, orange = some data is not up to date, red = no data is up to date
index.md.Le plugin offre la possibilité d'affiche: The plugin offers the possibility of displaying consumption and / or production data in a widget template imitating the appearance of a meter
index.md.permet de basculer de la consommation à: allows to switch from consumption to production for those who have access to 2 types of measures
index.md.Un voyant permet également de savoir si: An indicator also lets you know if the data is up to date or not
index.md.Pour activer cette option, il suffit de: To activate this option, just check the box
index.md.sur la page générale de l'équipement con: on the general page of the equipment concerned
index.md.Une fois le template de widget activé, r: Once the widget template is activated, go to the tab
index.md.de la configuration de l'équipement pour: from the configuration of the equipment to choose the background color of the widget
index.md.en fonction de la version d'accès à Jeed: depending on the Jeedom access version
index.md.La case \"Défaut\" permet de conserver l: The "Default" box allows you to keep the default colors of the tile
index.md.J'ai des erreurs `Error on enedis json r: I have `Error on enedis json return` errors in the logs yet the data is visible on the Enedis site
index.md.Il arrive quelquefois qu'il faille se re: It sometimes happens that you have to go directly to the Enedis site in order to validate the latest T & Cs to access the data again
index.md.Il est également parfois nécessaire de r: It is also sometimes necessary to replace the Jeedom / Enedis link from the plugin configuration page
index.md.Je n'ai pas de données Jour\/Mois\/Année: I don't have Day / Month / Year data for December 31, 2021
index.md.Pour récupérer ces données il suffit de: To recover this data just click on the button
index.md.et de sélectionner la date du 1er janvie: and select the date of January 1, 2021 as the departure date
